item.title: 2018 - In review
item.description: January February Comienzo trabajo en el Instituto de Estadisticas March Official Admission to MDS-UBC April May Cominezo trabajo con el PR-VDRS PyCon (Cleveland, OH) CarpentryCon (Dublin, IR) Belfast June July August Moved to Vancouver, BC September Started UBC October MDS courses November MDS courses December Travel to Ottawa
